TIPS¶

REQUIREMENTS¶

  • MatPlotLib 1.0 or above
  • BioPython

WebServer Installation tips¶

1. When deploying in web application call:

import os
os.environ['HOME'] = '/tmp'

before import biograpy to make matplotlib work

After saving the image call

panel.close()

to free matplotlib data from memory
